uploadToolManual: Upload a tool or equipment manual to generate training
generateSafetyTopics: Generate safety topics from an uploaded manual, or enter your own topic.
searchByTopic: Search by topic, project name, or job site address
searchByTool: Search by tool or equipment name
marketingMessage: Untrained workers cause accidents and OSHA fines. Stop wasting hours creating training. Upload any manual → instantly generate tool-specific training using OSHA guidelines. Print, sign, and stay compliant in English or Spanish.
safetyMeetingMessage: Don’t waste time on generic safety talks. Upload a manual or type a subject to instantly generate a job-specific safety meeting with hazards and OSHA safety guidelines.
formsMessage: Access 140+ ready-to-use, compliant PDF forms from Health & Safety Plan and Exposure Control Plan to Fall Protection Plan, Rescue Plan, Inspections, and OSHA recordkeeping forms.
